text: Two methods can be used to join the crochet to the linen: (a) Button Stitch round the outline of basting stitches, the knotted part of the button stitch lying on the outside edge. Oversew crochet to button stitch. (b) Turn under a small hem, with fold lying on line of basting stitches. Work a row of dc all round this hem, with 3 dc at each corner.
